meta.title: Golden Retriever Cost: Price, Monthly Expenses & Vet Bills
meta.description: How much does a Golden Retriever cost? Breakdown of puppy prices, monthly food costs, vet bills, and insurance premiums.

hero.one_line_summary: Expect to spend $1,500–$3,000 for a puppy and $150–$250 monthly for care.

first_year_breakdown.notes: Varies by breeder reputation and location.

monthly_breakdown.notes: Flea/tick prevention and annual exam savings.

emergency_costs.one_line_warning: Golden Retrievers are prone to expensive health issues like cancer and hip dysplasia.

insurance_section.reason: High risk of genetic health issues makes insurance a smart financial move.
insurance_section.value_explainer: Pays for itself with one major incident.

quick_answers.question: What is the key takeaway?
quick_answers.answer: This is a sample quick answer for validation purposes.
